revised_title: Investigation of Chlorophyll and Derivatives' Absorption Spectra in the Violet and Ultraviolet Region
tldr: The author investigates the absorption spectra of chlorophyll and its derivatives in the violet and ultraviolet region of the spectrum. They find a characteristic absorption between the solar lines F and M in all chlorophyll derivatives, confirming the relationship between chlorophyll and haemoglobin, the two main coloring matters in the plant and animal kingdoms.
